ComicInfo.Summary:
IMAGE'S SUPERNATURAL SENSATION CONTINUES! The second story arc begins! After the traumatizing finale of the previous issue, everything has changed. Who is Ohara and how does she fit into the great pattern of destiny and power?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Steven Cummings & Tamra Bonvillain | 1 | | B | Cover B | Takeshi Miyazawa | 2 | | C | Cover C | Edwin Huang | 3 |
